document.full_text: the federal judge in the corruption retrial of former illinois governor rod blagojevich wrapped up the questioning of potential jurors on thursday, raising the possibility opening arguments in the case could begin as soon as monday when the court reconvenes.
document.title: opening statements in blagojevich retrial could start monday
lines_and_colors: the federal judge in the corruption retrial of former illinois governor rod blagojevich wrapped up the questioning of potential jurors on thursday, raising the possibility opening arguments in the case could begin as soon as monday when the court reconvenes.
